review: Easy to install, Simple to Setup, and gave me exactly the capability I was looking for.  Trying to cut the cable and lose the expensive bundle I was paying for.  Using the Firestick with Hulu and NetFlix, I can now watch almost all of my shows and movies without the cable bill expense.  If you like local news, I would recommend an antenna to accompany it, but that was not my goal.
author: Randy

review: I have had my fire tv stick since they came out in December. I have had nothing but trouble with it. I have to unplug the power source every time we want to watch anything. This morning it just went nuts and kept flipping through the netflix menu and then just froze. I would not recommend this product until they fix things. I like my roku 100% better.
